content.question: Urbs erat occiduis notissima terris (line 1) is translated

choices.label: the city was very well-known to western lands
in the west there was a city well-known for its land
the western city was well-known because of its lands
there were very well-known cities among the western lands

content.answer: the city was very well-known to western lands

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
